txt.en:
'There are few things in this world that make me truly angry. Make my spine shudder and fingers clench with rage. Seeing a man enslaved by another, reduced to nothing but property, makes my teeth gnash.

'The corsairs are men who do not share this belief. Instead, they would enslave all of their enemy. Put them into camps making ships and weapons, and whip and beat them until they died, then simply replace them with the next.

'Several slavers are working out of the camp to the south. Ensure they never get the chance to take another as property again.'
The corsair camp at Hashadîr is home to several slavers. These foul men are preying on unaware travellers on the roads of Belfalas.
'Such vile men deserve a punishment far worse than what you were able to deliver, but for now it will have to satisfy.'
The corsair slavers are at Hashadîr, to the south of Dol Amroth.\n\nTolrían asked you to eliminate the slavers working out of the camp to the south.
Tolrían can be found in Dol Amroth.\n\nTolrían will be very pleased to hear the slavers have been eliminated.
